title: Chapter LXV - Ogdensburg Bridge And Port Authority
content:
Chapter LXV - Ogdensburg Bridge And Port Authority

State Regulations

Part 5700 - General Provisions And Definitions (§ 5700.1 to 5700.5)

Part 5701 - General Traffic Rules (§ 5701.1 to 5701.3)

Part 5702 - Requirements For Radioactive Material Shipments (§ 5702.1 to 5702.3)

Part 5703 - Operation Of Vehicles (§ 5703.1 to 5703.17)

Part 5704 - Bridge Crossing Toll Rate Schedule (§ 5704.1 to 5704.4)

Part 5705 - Prohibited Conduct (§ 5705.1 to 5705.9)

Part 5706 - Penalties (§ 5706.1)

Part 5707 - Amendments (§ 5707.1)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
